title: Heroku postdeploy execution timed out
body:
### System information
- **OS Platform and Distribution (e.g., Linux Ubuntu 16.04)**:
Heroku via https://dashboard.heroku.com/new?template=https://github.com/chakki-works/doccano/
- **Python version**: 
3.6

### Describe the problem
Deploying a new Heroku app with https://dashboard.heroku.com/new?template=https://github.com/chakki-works/doccano/ is failing on the 'Run scripts & scale dynos' step.  Everything before that with the environment setup and building appear to be succeeding.  It could be related to https://github.com/chakki-works/doccano/issues/236 and https://github.com/chakki-works/doccano/pull/237 ?

### Source code / logs

Here's how far the 'Run scripts & scale dynos' step gets before timing out:

[36;1mOperations to perform:[0m
[1m  Apply all migrations: [0madmin, api, auth, contenttypes, sessions, social_django
[36;1mRunning migrations:[0m
  Applying contenttypes.0001_initial...[32;1m OK[0m
  Applying auth.0001_initial...[32;1m OK[0m
  Applying admin.0001_initial...[32;1m OK[0m
  Applying admin.0002_logentry_remove_auto_add...[32;1m OK[0m
  Applying admin.0003_logentry_add_action_flag_choices...[32;1m OK[0m
  Applying contenttypes.0002_remove_content_type_name...[32;1m OK[0m
  Applying api.0001_initial...[32;1m OK[0m
  Applying auth.0002_alter_permission_name_max_length...[32;1m OK[0m
  Applying auth.0003_alter_user_email_max_length...[32;1m OK[0m
  Applying auth.0004_alter_user_username_opts...[32;1m OK[0m
  Applying auth.0005_alter_user_last_login_null...[32;1m OK[0m
  Applying auth.0006_require_contenttypes_0002...[32;1m OK[0m
  Applying auth.0007_alter_validators_add_error_messages...[32;1m OK[0m
  Applying auth.0008_alter_user_username_max_length...[32;1m OK[0m
  Applying auth.0009_alter_user_last_name_max_length...[32;1m OK[0m
  Applying sessions.0001_initial...[32;1m OK[0m
  Applying social_django.0001_initial...[32;1m OK[0m
  Applying social_django.0002_add_related_name...[32;1m OK[0m
  Applying social_django.0003_alter_email_max_length...[32;1m OK[0m
  Applying social_django.0004_auto_20160423_0400...[32;1m OK[0m
  Applying social_django.0005_auto_20160727_2333...[32;1m OK[0m
  Applying social_django.0006_partial...[32;1m OK[0m
  Applying social_django.0007_code_timestamp...[32;1m OK[0m
  Applying social_django.0008_partial_timestamp...[32;1m OK[0m
